>
Perceptro cursed and typed some commands, and
> the defensive system =
startted to locate the
> intruders while the weapons started toa raise
> an=
d aim at signatures.

The defensive systems respond sluggishly to Perceptor=
=E2=80=99s command as they reroute
power and data around damaged systems, a=
nd steal it from other systems.  
 
Sensors
are partially offline, but what=
 they can tell Perceptor is that the Autobot and
Decepticon energy signatur=
es are all outside the base traveling along the same
tunnel that Scorponok =
used. The opening of the tunnel that they are using will
deposit them appro=
ximately 300 meters from the entrance of Black fortress
itself. 
 
=E2=80=
=9CWARNING!=E2=80=9D
The computer emits in strong feminine tones as it atte=
mpts to comply with
Perceptor=E2=80=99s commands. =E2=80=9CAttempting to op=
en weapon ports to engage external
defenses is not recommended while the st=
ation is submerging.=E2=80=9D
 
The
computer paused and then buzzed as it t=
ransferred power in preparation to
activate weapons, =E2=80=9CDo you wish t=
o override safety protocols?=E2=80=9D 


> Hydras left his CR chamber and s=
ent a privatemessage
> to Perceptor asking for information while he reached=

> the command room, Jhiaxus and Darkhawk left their
> respective chambers =
and joined Hydras in the command
> room.
 
As Hydras, Jhiaxus and Darkhwak =
enter the
command room that, they are greeted with an unfamilliar sight: Th=
e room is in a shambles! The table is
flipped and the chairs are scattered =
around the room, the room itself an obvious victim of the pounding that had=
 hit the base a few hours ago. However the room is other wise
undamaged. 
 =

The
lights flicker and then dim as power is rerouted from auxiliary system=
s to
power the defenses. 
 
Preston
